recipesJson.name: Candied Yams
recipesJson.author: mlNikon
recipesJson.description: This is a staple side dish at my family's Thanksgiving dinners. Do not vape this right off the scale, it will be too raw and bitter because of the butter pecan.. Tfa yam and HS pumpkin pie come together to make the yams in this recipe. Molasses is a must have ingredient and can not be subbed. It is such a nice dark, sweet flavor. I like putting marshmallows and pecans in my candied yams.
